game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a thrilling quest to locate the long-lost treasure. Explore mysterious locations, solve challenging puzzles, and overcome dangerous obstacles in order to claim the riches that lie beneath.
game.reward: A chest full of gold coins and precious gems

task.objective: Obtain a map from Captain Redbeard
task.description: Follow Captain Redbeard to his secret cave where the treasure is hidden.
Scavenger hunt around the cave, looking for any artifacts or signs that might lead to the treasure.
Follow a hidden path deep into the cave, where an ancient chest awaits the treasure's discovery.
